content.rendered: Do you prefer to sip your favourite brew slowly throughout the day, or do you prefer to set aside some me and tea time for yourself? In either case, our Kiosk Etched Black Tumbler is ideal. It keeps your favourite brew at the perfect temperature so you can sip or drink whenever and wherever you want. Inspired by the true essence of Kiosk Kaffee, Kiosk Etched Black Tumbler is a basic yet iconic kaffee tumbler along with the signature Kiosk logo to seize your day right! The tumbler is an ideal travel companion for your daily commute. It’s literally one size fits all – your carry bag, back pack, or car cup holder. There will be no spills because it is also leak proof. The tumbler’s double wall vacuum insulation keeps the inside contents warm for hours and prevents condensation from forming on its exterior.
